issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: iOS: Keyboard disappears upon typing the first letter in an empty textfield
fields.environment:
SIM: iPhone 8 Version 13.2
SDK Version: 9.0.2.GA and below

comments.body:
I tried sample app given https://drive.google.com/open?id=1HaUmYK-KjbPerkw72feUtmlgwAFEjwbI
on simulators iPhone 8 plus 12.2, iPhone8 13.2.2 and iPhone  SE (2nd generation) 13.5 and device iPhone11 13.5 and iPhone5s 12.1.
The issue is happening only on simulator iPhone8 13.2.2. On other iOS version and device it is working fine.
It may be some issue with iOS 13.2.
[~eboateng] Can you try on some other iOS version and let me know the behavior? cc [~lchoudhary]

[~vijaysingh] I tried on simulator iPhone 8 versions 12.0, 12.1 and 12.2 and there was no issue at all but on version 12.4 the keyboard did not even appear when the textfields for both middle name and last name were clicked.

Also, I tried on simulator iPhone 8 versions 13.0, 13.1 and 13.2 and it was an issue on each.
